# Roleplay Rule 1 ## Crew must follow their Job Expectations.
All crew are expected to perform their duties in line with their Job Expectations. Of course, circumstances may arise where a crew member is unable to perform their duties, but during normal station operation, crew members are expected to perform their duties to the best of their ability.
You can find more information about the different roles and their expectations below: - [textlink="Job Expectations" link="SandwichJobExpectations"]
